definition: (of garments) against the skin/to line/lining/to contrast with/to assist financially
garment/jacket with open slits in place of sleeves

sentences.english: He wore a dirty white t-shirt and high-water jeans.
sentences.chinese: 他穿着意見很髒的白色襯衫和一件牛仔馬褲。

sentences.english: Workers weave silk thread into beautiful shirts.
sentences.chinese: 工人把絲線織成漂亮的襯衫。

sentences.english: A shirt is taken off a threadlike clothes-line.
sentences.chinese: 一件襯衫從晾衣繩上滑落。

sentences.english: His shirt ripped at the seam.
Wear an open shirt, and touch your neck and collarbone.
sentences.chinese: 穿一件開襟襯衫，撫摸自己的脖子和鎖骨。

sentences.english: The colors arent fast, so be careful when you wash this shirt.
sentences.chinese: 這些顏色易褪色，所以洗襯衫時要小心。

sentences.english: A selection of long- sleeved casual shirts featuring contemporary and classic styles.
sentences.chinese: 精選的長袖休閒襯衫採用現代和古典風格。

sentences.english: A shirt that says "Hawaii is beautiful".
sentences.chinese: 一種上面印着“夏威夷真美麗”的襯衫。

sentences.english: This shirt is all cotton. It breathes.
sentences.chinese: 這件襯衫是全棉的，很透氣。

sentences.english: The tight shirt rides up out of the trousers when I sit down.
sentences.chinese: 我一坐下這件緊身襯衫就從褲子裏跑到上面來了。
極其精緻的女士貼身襯衫。

sentences.english: That long - sleeve blouse fits you well.
He just hides them down the back of his shirt.
sentences.chinese: 他只是把它們都藏到了襯衫後面。

sentences.english: Some of the pictures showed me on the beach without my shirt on.
sentences.chinese: 其中有些我沒有穿襯衫站在海灘上的照片。

sentences.english: If the suit is buttoned, where should be the stickpin?
sentences.chinese: 西裝系著扣時，領帶夾應在襯衫的哪兩粒鈕釦之間？

sentences.english: They wouldn't take the shirt back.
